data.title: How much do Arizona Christian University Hotel and Conference Center employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of Arizona Christian University Hotel and Conference Center is estimated to be approximate $45 per year. The majority pay is between $39 to $52 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out Arizona Christian University Hotel and Conference Center salary, Arizona Christian University Hotel and Conference Center pay rate, and more.
data.text:
1. How much does Arizona Christian University Hotel and Conference Center in the United States pay?

Arizona Christian University Hotel and Conference Center pays its employees an average of $45 per hour. The average salary at Arizona Christian University Hotel and Conference Center range from $39 to $52 per hour.

2. Do Arizona Christian University Hotel and Conference Center employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at Arizona Christian University Hotel and Conference Center is lesser than Office of State Coordinator of Vocational Education for Students. The highest salary package reported for an employee at Arizona Christian University Hotel and Conference Center is $52 per hour, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at Office of State Coordinator of Vocational Education for Students is $57 per hour.
